title: Rinshou Hanzai Gakusha Himura Hideo no Field Note
original_name: 臨床犯罪学者・火村英生のフィールドノート
sinopse:
A four volume manga adaptation of the Sakka Alice series titled Rinshou Hanzai Gakusha Himura Hideo no Field Note.

Vol 1: Hitokui no Taki
Vol 2: Shuiro no Kenkyuu Yuuhigaoka Satsujin Jiken
Vol 3: Shuiro no Kenkyuu Karekinada Satsujin Jiken
Vol 4: 201 Goshitsu no Saiyaku
